reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's feminine style, quality, and softness, with one noting it's suitable for both dressy and casual wear.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ruffled sweater
items.body: Super cute, felt nice and soft. Size wise pretty much true to fit. I purchased a small and it is loose but not baggy. Hits a a good spot on my upper hip, not too long. I’m 5’2” and weight 127. Fairly light weight and sufficient quality for the price. This review is based on straight from the packaging product, I haven't washed and dried it yet. Read more
items.author: R Rutherford

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Sweater Is So Flattering
items.body: This sweater was purchased for a special occasion and surpassed all expectations. The construction is very good, and the details are finely finished. This sweater is classic, with a feminine style, not too thin, and fit me like it was tailored. The off white will go with anything, but I believe I need another color. Read more
items.author: Kathy P.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great item if you have normal tatas.
items.body: Material is super soft, loved the ruffles and color is exactly as pictured. Sadly largest size does not accommodate ladies with large chests. If you have normal sized tatas, this is a great item. Read more
items.author: Tracy M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful quality cardigan.
items.body: Woman’s ruffle cardigan sweater: This sweater is beautiful! Excellent quality. I here to give this review for anyone who is between sizes. If it helps you any, it does run slightly, very slightly larger. I purchased a large, I’m in between a medium.- large and it is slightly big on me. I still can wear it, but I’m going to purchase another color in medium! Read more
items.author: Sabra Beton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dressy sweater or casual too
items.body: The material is soft and comfortable. I love how the ruffles dress it up. Fit is great. I returned mine because I’m choosing another color, but I really like this sweater. Ordering a second color. Read more
items.author: dolphinlady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice!
items.body: Very pretty! I ordered the Small and it fit perfectly. Soft knit and great color for the Holidays. Read more
items.author: Heidi Bette

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Material is off putting.
items.body: Cute style and a good true fit. I don’t like the material of these off brand sweaters. In my opinion, the material resembles recycled plastic. Unfortunately this cute sweater was returned. Read more
items.author: CF

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So soft and cute
items.body: Super soft and cute! May buy in more colors. The ruffles add a little pizazz to this! Read more
items.author: Onyourmarx

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Burgundy, White-a, Army Green, Black, Red, Khaki, White, Pink-a, Beige, Yellow, Red-a, Light Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
